nodes.documentation: @dev A splitter moves positions and weth collateral from Dealers (using the IVault interface) to MakerDAO.
nodes.name: Splitter

nodes.documentation:
@dev Moves all WETH debt and collateral from `from` in YDai to `to` in MakerDAO.
 `to` needs to authorize treasury in vat with `_vat.hope(address(_treasury))`.
nodes.name: split
